title: Orae Oru Oorula Lyrics Orange Mittai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Orae Oru Oorula
Singer(s): Justin Prabhakaran & Vijay Sethupathi
Lyrics: Vijay Sethupathi,

Ore oru oorla
namma singa raja vaazhnduchan
paera sonna podhumey
andha oorey bayandhu nadunguchaam
singathuu odambu ippo sari illa
(he is serious)
kooti poga muyal onnu nari onnu
ambulance il yaaru
namma singa thaathava paaru

singamum nariyum
kutti sandai pottucham (ha ha ha ha)
adha theethu vaika
muyalum paada pattuchaam

singathoda nariyum nariyoda singamum
idayila muyalum, sema fight sema fight
singa nari nari singam
singa nari nari singam
singam singam singam
singam singam singam
singam singam Singam gethu
nari vethu
ippo singam laugh (ha ha ha ha ha)
namma singam laugh (haha ha ha ha ha)

seatil vandha singatha
parthu seriousnu doctor sonnarey
kooti vanda muyalam ippo
romba romba upset aayiruchey
(Sad, he is so sad)

hospital enaku venaa,
indha marundhu maathirayum enaku venaa
pozhachi irupen da thaana
naa yaarunu nenachey
myuyal payale dei
(what the hell you think about me?)
sir, sir, plz sonna kelunga, sir sir..
hei, singam da
ippo singam laugh (ha ha ha ha ha)
ore oru oorla namma singa raja vaazhnduchan
